body: This is really starting to get annoying. On most occasions, I can't even get through one game of walls or nexus, without everything freezing, and me timing out. Mods/Admins pls read this! We need this problem fixed.
body_tagged: This is really starting to get annoying. On most occasions, I can't even get through one game of walls or nexus, without everything freezing, and me timing out. Mods/Admins pls read this! We need this problem fixed.
title: CONSTANTLY Timing out.

replies.body:
Timeout= nerdy for "lost connection"
Guessing by the amount pf people that are getting this error, the avicus server's are having a problem[most likely crashing].
We just have to wait for the avicus staff to fix it.....
